mapper.sql: saleIncome, salePay,purchaseIncome, purchasePay, customerRepay, suppierRepay, feeIncome, feePay
mapper.select: SELECT da.dict_text AS payCate, SUM(CASE WHEN sto.orderStatus =5 AND sto.sellerStoreId=#{storeId} THEN sto.debetAmt ELSE 0 END) AS saleIncome , SUM(CASE WHEN sto.orderStatus =7 AND sto.sellerStoreId=#{storeId} THEN sto.payCost1 ELSE 0 END) AS salePay, SUM(CASE WHEN sto.orderStatus =5 AND sto.buyerStoreId=#{storeId} THEN sto.debetAmt ELSE 0 END) AS purchasePay, SUM(CASE WHEN sto.orderStatus =7 AND sto.buyerStoreId=#{storeId} THEN sto.payCost1 ELSE 0 END) AS purchaseIncome, (CASE WHEN p.customerRepay IS NOT NULL THEN p.customerRepay ELSE 0 END )AS customerRepay , (CASE WHEN p.suppierRepay IS NOT NULL THEN p.suppierRepay ELSE 0 END ) AS suppierRepay, (CASE WHEN c.feeIncome IS NOT NULL THEN c.feeIncome ELSE 0 END ) AS feeIncome , (CASE WHEN c.feePay IS NOT NULL THEN c.feePay ELSE 0 END ) AS feePay FROM ss_stoorder_#{storeId} sto LEFT JOIN ss_financial ssf ON ssf.orderNo =sto.payOrderNo AND ssf.buyerId=sto.buyerStoreId AND ssf.sellerId=sto.sellerStoreId LEFT JOIN ss_data_dictionary da ON da.storeId = #{storeId} AND da.dict_value = sto.payCate1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT 0 AS feeIncome ,cgs.storeId, SUM(cgs.payCost ) AS feePay, cgs.payCate FROM ss_cgsorder cgs WHERE cgs.storeId = #{storeId} AND cgs.order_time >= str_to_date(#{timeFrom},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND cgs.order_time <= str_to_date(#{timeTo},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') )c ON c.storeId=#{storeId} AND c.payCate = sto.payCate1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN pay.payObjType =1 THEN pay.payAmt ELSE 0 END) AS customerRepay , SUM(CASE WHEN pay.payObjType =2 THEN pay.payAmt ELSE 0 END) AS suppierRepay, pay.payType, pay.storeId FROM ss_payment pay WHERE pay.storeId=#{storeId} AND pay.payTime >= str_to_date(#{timeFrom},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND pay.payTime <= str_to_date(#{timeTo},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') )p ON p.storeId=#{storeId} AND p.payType=sto.payCate1 WHERE 1=1 AND ssf.orderNo IS NOT NULL AND ((sto.debetAmt>0 AND sto.orderStatus=5) OR STO.orderStatus=7) AND sto.orderTime >= str_to_date(#{timeFrom},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND sto.orderTime <= str_to_date(#{timeTo},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND sto.payCate1=#{payCate}

SELECT sum(detail.count) as quantity, SUM(detail.price*detail.count) AS amount, detail.productName as productName FROM ss_stodetail_#{query.storeId} detail LEFT JOIN ss_stoorder_#{query.storeId} sto ON sto.payOrderNo = detail.orderId left join sp_product_#{query.storeId} product on product.id=detail.productId left join sp_pbrand brand on brand.id = product.brandId and brand.storeId =detail.storeId LEFT JOIN sp_product_type productType ON productType.id =product.productType and productType.storeId =detail.storeId LEFT JOIN sp_client c ON c.storeId = sto.buyerStoreId LEFT JOIN sc_wechat_bind wechat ON wechat.openId = c.openid AND wechat.storeId = sto.sellerStoreId where 1=1 AND wechat.storeId IS NOT NULL AND sto.orderStatus ='5' and sto.buyerStoreId=#{query.storeId} AND sto.orderTime >=str_to_date(#{query.timeFrom},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND sto.orderTime <=str_to_date(#{query.timeTo},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and productName in #{item}
order by quantity asc
order by quantity desc
order by amount desc
order by amount desc
group by productName
